short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome extension that sets novelists free. Write your novel in Google Docs. Easy-peasy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Structure your novel in a folder tree. Have a document for each scene. Manuscriptify helps you to manage your story structure, and compile your documents into a manuscript for submission.
